sentences.en: Chronic pain can systematically erode the quality of life.
sentences.cn: 长期的痛苦感受能有系统地侵蚀基本生活条件.

sentences.en: Erode free will, and you erode that argument.
sentences.cn: 但是,自由意志被破坏了, 这条论据也就不成立了.

sentences.en: Forest soil under growing trees generally does not erode.
sentences.cn: 正在生长的树木下面的森林土壤一般不会被冲刷.

sentences.en: However a sharp slide in the euro would erode its credibility.
sentences.cn: 但汇率的大幅下滑会损害欧元的信誉.

sentences.en: It has a good erode - resistant ability.
sentences.cn: 一般将烧结石分为二种.

sentences.en: Our personal freedom is being gradually eroded away.
sentences.cn: 我们的个人自由正逐渐受到限制。

sentences.en: Repeated exam failure had eroded her confidence.
sentences.cn: 考试屡屡不及格削弱了她的自信心。

sentences.en: Retailers, of course , loathe price cuts because they erode profits.
sentences.cn: 零售商 当然 不喜欢减价销售,因为利润会变薄.

sentences.en: The cliffs are being constantly eroded by heavy seas.
sentences.cn: 悬崖正不断受到汹涌海浪的侵蚀。

sentences.en: The pressure towards uniformity constantly threatens to erode local traditions.
sentences.cn: 一体化的压力一直威胁着地方传统.

sentences.en: The rocks have gradually eroded away.
The sea have erode the cliff face over the years.
sentences.cn: 海水经年累月冲刷著峭壁的表面.

sentences.en: The usual analysis has correctly pointed to pressures that tend to make cartel power erode.
sentences.cn: 通常的分析曾正确地指出了使卡特尔的力量受到削弱的种种压力.

sentences.en: The value of the dollar began to erode rapidly just around this time.
sentences.cn: 刚好在这个时候，美元开始迅速贬值。

sentences.en: The waves erode the rocks on the shore.
sentences.cn: 海浪浸蚀着岸边的岩石.

sentences.en: These tributaries are subsequent streams which erode strike valley.
sentences.cn: 这些支流系即为蚀出走向谷的次生河.

sentences.en: They had already seen the value of their stock erode considerably.
sentences.cn: 他们已经看到了他们的股票价值下跌了不少.

sentences.en: To erode or be eroded by abrasion.
sentences.cn: 侵蚀通过磨损而侵蚀或被侵蚀.
